title: Ovid Technologies
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: ovid_technologies
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $753.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Ovid Technologies. The average
  contract duration was 0.45 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $180.7K. The longest
  contract was 2.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $952.8K.
lookup_name: 'OVID TECHNOLOGIES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '753.7K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '20'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '15%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '140%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.4M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.45'
s421_mean_contract_value: '180.7K'
s425_max_duration: '2.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '952.8K'
---
